snippet: California appears to have joined New York in weighing Exxon Mobil’s honesty in admitting to the risks posed by climate change.
abstract: California Atty Gen Kamala D Harris is investigating whether Exxon Mobil lied to public and shareholders about risks of climate change, and whether firm's statements are violations of securities laws.
lead_paragraph: California appears to have joined New York in weighing Exxon Mobil’s honesty in admitting to the risks posed by climate change.

headline.main: California Said to Target Exxon in Climate Inquiry
